website_summaries.verdict: These organic cotton muslin burp cloths are breathable and lightweight.
pros: Made from 100% muslin and organic cotton
4 layers for added durability and absorbency
Quality binding holds up to excessive use
Contoured shape to fit easily on shoulder
cons: Customers commented that these aren't absorbent enough to handle big messes

customer_reviews.title: This was cheaper deal compared to Aden + Anais burpy ...
customer_reviews.text: This was cheaper deal compared to Aden + Anais burpy bibs. So i gave it a try. but it is cheaper and you get what you pay for.. compared to Aden+Anais, 1. It is smaller: it still covers your shoulder enough but it is a little smaller. 2. It does not have the snap buttons so it cannot be used as bibs. 3. It is not as soft as Aden + Anais brand 4. more lint come off when washed but it absorb as well as Aden + Anais. cheaper than Aden brand. hope it helped
customer_reviews.author: Lydia J.

customer_reviews.title: Not bad, but needs additional width
customer_reviews.text: Pros: - Nice fluffy cotton - The curvature is good so it fits well around your shoulders Cons: - Deducting two stars for how thin the middle of this is in terms of width, it's about 7" . I'm a guy with shoulders. It doesn't cover my shoulders when burping. -This could using several more inches of fabric in the middle so the coverage is better. Shoulder width aside, it would be better to have additional width in as ours like to flop his head around side to side, he can have a spitup to the sides too, he's not going to just puke straight down my back!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: When Absorbency and Size Matter
customer_reviews.text: I initially ordered these burp cloths for their organic materials, but I did not realize how great otherwise they would turn out to be. They are larger than others I have received as baby gifts, perfectly covering your front and back shoulder for those excessive spit-up sessions. While they were soft when I received them, it seems they have only grown softer after several washings. For the price, I think they are a great value and we are already ordering more. 3 is a great starter number, but you will definitely want more.
customer_reviews.author: Kerra

customer_reviews.title: Absorbent, durable and easy to clean!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best burp pads for babies. I first ordered them in 2017 for my great nephew at about 3-4 months when teething started and slobbering was constant. They are very absorbent, durable and easy to clean. I know consider this a standard baby gift, especially for that age range. Love surprising the next generation of new parents with helpful gifts throughout the first year of their baby’s life. ♥️😍
customer_reviews.author: A S.

customer_reviews.title: Great size, good quality
customer_reviews.text: These are great burp cloths, especially for the price. They are good quality and very similar to the aden + anais burpy bibs, although these do not have snaps to become a bib. However, they are longer than the burpy bibs, which is great for more protection over the shoulder. We have several burpy bibs as well, so I didn't feel that I needed all of our burp cloths to be dual purpose. And three of these cloths are about the same price as two burpy bibs. I'm glad I purchased a set of these; it's nice to have a good amount of burp cloths on hand! Otherwise I would be doing a lot more laundry.
customer_reviews.author: Erin A.

customer_reviews.title: Our first choice...
customer_reviews.text: Yes, they are expensive. No doubt, the manufacturer is making money hand-over-fist for these burp cloths alone. But all baby item manufacturers know that parents are going to fork over the cash, so you might as well go ahead and purchase them. They are the best burp cloth we've tried among our five children.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Smith Carroll

customer_reviews.title: Soft and useful--worth the extra cost
customer_reviews.text: These are great. Much more useful than the cloth diapers we were using as burp cloths before. The greater surface area is helpful, and they're super soft. I had only bought one set because they're more expensive than cloth diaper burp cloths, but went ahead and ordered more since these work so much better.
customer_reviews.author: Tacy

customer_reviews.title: Best ones we've got!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these and the Anis and Ani ones. Honesty, these are slightly thinner, but I like them more than the A&A. You get a bit more for your money (these are still expensive!) and they basically work the same. I'm not trying to use one nasty burp cloth all day! I generally change after every few spit ups anyway, so these are a much better purchase. They have washed up better as well. The patterns on the A&A get faded and kind of hard after a while- I like these best! Just get them!
customer_reviews.author: Love Babies and Dogs

customer_reviews.title: These fit my breast friend
customer_reviews.text: Use these when my wife feeds using my breast friend. They help capture any spit up while feeding. Love the colors and they are soft and well made. Would highly recommend as we have other burp cloths that we bought at Target for cheaper but they are not as nice as these. Great because we can use them on our little one without worrying about it being rough.
customer_reviews.author: Mitul Patel

customer_reviews.title: My go-to burp cloths, better than aden and anais
customer_reviews.text: Just as some other reviewers have said, it's better than the aden and anais ones. After washing, the A+A ones shrink so much more than these do, so they're not as helpful for the stream of spit-up my little one often has. These absorb well and wash easily. They do shrink a bit and the texture becomes a bit different, but nothing unexpected and still a good large size. I bought a second set later. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: saucecake

customer_reviews.title: Changed material
customer_reviews.text: We received one set of these burp cloths about 6 months ago and they were so amazing that we decided to order more. It looks like they changed materials though as our recent order was much thinner and rougher than the original. Look elsewhere if you want soft and absorbent burp cloths.
customer_reviews.author: Sapna

customer_reviews.title: Absorbent but not well designed
customer_reviews.text: These are a nice, soft, absorbent material like the Aden & Anais, but the design flaw is having two "neck cutouts" in the center, giving the cloth an hourglass shape. While the cloth fits against your neck on one side, it leaves your shoulder exposed on the other. The length is good, but the slim width in the middle has resulted in a lot of spitup "misses" onto my shirts.
customer_reviews.author: Jaykay

customer_reviews.title: Good quality burp clothes
customer_reviews.text: We got two sets of these these burp clothes (white and multicolored) as baby shower gifts and they are so great that we bought two extra sets (another white and multicolored) after our baby was born so we would always have plenty on hand. Good absorbency and softness, great colors, and the shape is perfect for over the shoulder. Only complaint is that the blue one bleed in the wash...I learned that the hard way.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Our favorite burp cloths!
customer_reviews.text: My partner, myself, our family and our newborn love these burp cloths the most! They're absorbent, fit well on your shoulder, easy to store in a dresser or diaper bag and I love knowing they're made from organic cotton. I highly recommend these and love giving them as baby shower gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Mallory M.

customer_reviews.title: Just another burp cloth
customer_reviews.text: These burp cloths are just that: burp cloths. The only advantage to them is that they sit well on your shoulder since they're contoured, but otherwise they're honestly nothing special to me. I had to buy more burp cloths after my baby was born because I realized you need about 15 of them to not feel like you're constantly doing laundry and the ones I bought later were way more absorbent than these. These aren't bad, just not the best.
customer_reviews.author: Grace Utley

customer_reviews.title: Look somewhere else
customer_reviews.text: These are surprisingly thin and rough compared to other muslin burp clothes we purchased. I wouldn’t waste my money on these. You can find much better quality elsewhere. The only thing positive I can say is that they are good sized.
customer_reviews.author: MS

customer_reviews.title: A great find! Soft for preemie skin.
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for our preemie who has to bottle feed and gets a little messy when he's eating. They also dual function as burp cloths. We've been really pleased with them. They're absorbent and soft for his sensitive skin. The price is also better than Aden + anais, so we were able to buy a few sets of them to keep down on laundry (which is a constant anyway but every little bit helps in those early days!)
customer_reviews.author: Sarah E.

customer_reviews.title: Best Burl Cloth
customer_reviews.text: Best Burp cloth ever. They absorb so well. The shape is great for shoulders. We switched to these for our 3rd baby and I wish we would have had them for our first 2! Worth the money. They should sell them in bigger sets. Great shower gift
customer_reviews.author: 1214PropellerPoint

customer_reviews.title: love these!
customer_reviews.text: These are comparable to the Aden and Anais burp bibs but I definitely prefer the green sprouts. They are less expensive but to me almost seem even better in quality. When my reflux baby started teething we were needing large, heavy duty burp cloths and these did the trick! The shape makes them easy to drape over your chest or shoulder. Also the shape hugs around her nicely during tummy time - I lay it in front of her while she play so it catches the drool. Definitely a worth while purchase I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: MKLily

customer_reviews.title: Great, very absorbent
customer_reviews.text: These burp cloths are great. I was not a fan of the colors and wish the company would make other options but aside from the they are great. They are very absorbent and great for catching spit up. I bought them primarily because they are organic but they absorb so well I use them for any spit up accidents.
customer_reviews.author: LNH726

customer_reviews.title: Not as pictured
customer_reviews.text: We ordered the pink set to complement the blue set we already had. The pink set are shaped differently. Instead of being ambidextrous, they only have the indented curve on one side, so you have to pay attention when you drape it. They are also a little larger. The dark pink cloth arrived with a hole in the seam, but I didn't notice in time to return it. We were really pleased with the originals, shaped as pictured, but that is not what we received when we ordered the pink set.
customer_reviews.author: s

customer_reviews.title: Love!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these! I love muslin cotton but some brands can be really think. These are great quality and very absorbent. Nice and soft to wipe baby’s face or neck when he spits up. Love the large size and the shape that contours where your neck is so you don’t have fabric bunching in babies face and it’s also not fall off my shoulder every two seconds.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are amazing. Super soft
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing. Super soft, wash up great, and perfect size. Not too small, plenty of coverage, but not huge and falling off like others. I bought one pack of the white ones to try, but I will definitely be getting more this week before baby #4 gets here ! Wish I would've had these with my other babies. Also, these are a great price. You get 3 in a pack for about the same price as you pay for 1 or 2 if the A&A, PLUS the reassurance and comfort of organic !
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Soft and large
customer_reviews.text: These muslin cloths are thick, durable and quite large in size. They seem to be getting softer with each wash. The only thing I do not like about it is that I cannot shove it into my pocket and take it with me everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Mia

customer_reviews.title: GREAT
customer_reviews.text: Love organic cotton for baby. GREAT SIZE; babies are messy. Will definitely buy more when second one comes around.
customer_reviews.author: J. Costanzo

customer_reviews.title: So useful!
customer_reviews.text: I have reordered these 3 times, we use them for everything. Burp cloths, wash cloths, impromptu diaper changes, folded as a cushion for head or bumper in stroller. They are so useful
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: These are the best burp cloths! They are super-fast absorbing and the size is perfect for throwing over your shoulder without falling off. Our baby even enjoys snuggling his face into the soft muslin material of a freshly cleaned cloth. I have bought extra for neighbor's and best friend's babies and they also love them. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Love these cloths and highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these burp cloths. I love them so much I bought another 6. They absorb spit up very well and are the largest burp cloths I know of. I highly recommend. I have tried many and these are by far the best because of softness and size. The negative is that they can easy pull a string or get stuck to for example velcrow.
customer_reviews.author: run99

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Thick material, good quality. Large enough to provide good coverage. Shape is convenient.
customer_reviews.author: CG

customer_reviews.title: Best burp cloths I’ve used
customer_reviews.text: These are the best burp cloths I’ve ever owned. I have two kids, the youngest is 3 weeks old. I wish I would have had these with my first. They’re super soft, look nice, and durable. Well worth the money. I would purchase again. These would make a great baby shower gift too.
customer_reviews.author: Erica B

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Love these burp cloths! They are so soft and versatile. The shape is perfect and they get softer with each wash. I loved them so much I ordered them again. You can never have too many burp cloths! I would definitely recommend these and/or buy them as a baby shower gift.
customer_reviews.author: Akaylah Varela

customer_reviews.title: My wife and I like these because they are shaped to wrap slightly around ...
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I like these because they are shaped to wrap slightly around your neck. It helps prevent spit up from going down your shirt when you are burping your child. These are way better than the traditional burp clothes that are rectangular with the extra thickness in the middle. These are somewhere in between the 2 thicknesses of the traditional burp cloths. I don't understand the need for the 2 thickness on the traditional burp cloths.
customer_reviews.author: Vegetable City Sur

customer_reviews.title: These are very soft and I love the shape of them
customer_reviews.text: These are very soft and I love the shape of them. They fit perfectly over the shoulder so if baby spits up in the whole area it's pretty much covered. They wash and dry very nicely and are very absorbent for spit up, my baby is EBF and there are no stains; can't vouch for formula spit up!
customer_reviews.author: Breezy

customer_reviews.title: Great for Spitty Babes
customer_reviews.text: Love these, I have a spitty baby and we go through a lot of these on a given day and I love these ones compared to other similar brands. They get softer the more times you wash them and stay put on your shoulder for when you have the baby who likes to lift their head whilst spitting up, so it doesn't go down your shirt.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: My favorite burp cloths - Absorbent, great shape, quality & size!
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite burp cloths. I use them during feeding time to catch any drips, and then afterwards to wipe my baby's face. They are very absorbent, and I love the shape, since they are curved, they fit perfectly on my shoulder! They're very soft, and I've found that this size is ideal when compared to the other burp cloths that I've purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: I love these burp clothes
customer_reviews.text: I love these burp clothes! I have the more expensive kind too, but I keep coming back to these. My son is a spitter and these do a great job at keeping him and myself clean and dry. I've already bought them several times, saves on having to do the laundry 4-5 times a day and keeping spares at Grandma's :)
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: OK.
customer_reviews.text: They're OK. The shape is fine for the contour of my neck/shoulder but I wish they were a bit thicker. While they were cheaper than some other high end brands, they still seem a bit overpriced for what they essentially are.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: The colors are vibrant and cheery and make me happy. I don't use them over my shoulder but ...
customer_reviews.text: These are so soft!!! The colors are vibrant and cheery and make me happy. I don't use them over my shoulder but just as a regular cloth to wipe my baby's face. These are my favorite because they're so gentle. They should make more things out of this fabric.
customer_reviews.author: AB

customer_reviews.title: These were a gift for a friend and she loved them. I actually own these in other colors ...
customer_reviews.text: These were a gift for a friend and she loved them. I actually own these in other colors and for one, they are huge. Two, thecurve in them is perfect for on your shoulder, and last, they are super absorbent! I recommend these to all my friends having babies!
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Soft and BIG!
customer_reviews.text: These are going to be my new go-to baby shower gift! They're very soft but perhaps most importantly they're quite a bit larger than others I've tried. (Definitely larger - and less expensive! - than the aden and anais ones.) Size really matters because it's the worst when you're dressed and ready to walk out the door and then the baby spits up just beyond reach of a little burp cloth. That won't (well, shouldn't!) happen with these.
customer_reviews.author: Anna P. Bard

customer_reviews.title: Not as soft as others
customer_reviews.text: Nice shape, thickness. Another company makes similar except with snaps so it can turn into a bib. Also, the other one is a softer Muslin (Aden and Anais).
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: These are great. Highly absorbent and soft to the touch
customer_reviews.text: These are great. Highly absorbent and soft to the touch. They are big enough to cover your whole shoulder. I love them! Recently became very expensive. I got them for $15. Now they cost $22. I would wait until the price comes back down a little.
customer_reviews.author: Comediekid

customer_reviews.title: They are made of good cotton and so far have held up with no ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these after getting a set of Aden and Anais burp cloths. They are slightly thinner but work just as well and are a bit cheaper. They are made of good cotton and so far have held up with no frays or tearing. They are my favorite burp cloths by far.
customer_reviews.author: AngelSora

customer_reviews.title: Love them.
customer_reviews.text: These are great they are thick and they extend further down than the gerber heavy weight gauze burp cloths/diapers. I would recommend these they are a little more but they are worth it. I have not used them yet with my baby but I just ordered them and they seem like they will withstand the test of time.
customer_reviews.author: Aurora

customer_reviews.title: The best burp cloths
customer_reviews.text: The best burp cloths!! Actually catches the spit up instead of it running down the cloths, and absorbs it quickly without letting it soak through to my shoulder. Machine washable, and the colors stayed bright, but i wouldnt put them in the dryer again. I lay them out to dry so they keep their size.
customer_reviews.author: Ambermonster

customer_reviews.title: The perfect burp cloths
customer_reviews.text: Soft, durable, wash well. I have used these with every baby and recommend them to all friends.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna

customer_reviews.title: These are hands down the best burp pads!
customer_reviews.text: These are hands down the best burp pads! I've purchased many of these and love them. They are perfectly shaped to lay over your shoulder without falling off and are very soft. They start to shrink a tiny bit once you wash and dry them, but they get softer with every wash. My baby loves the way they feel against his skin as do I. Great purchase and I will buy more in the future.

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I LOVE these. They are very good quality, super think but feel super soft as well. I’m thinking about getting one more set of them
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Norris

customer_reviews.title: Nice burp cloths
customer_reviews.text: Very soft, absorbent organic cotton burp cloths. The shape sits on the shoulder and protects better than regular cloth diaper-style burp cloths. Could be a bit wider for more protection. These are a little less expensive than the A&A printed burpy bibs, which I prefer due to their width and ability to do double-duty as a bib.
customer_reviews.author: amazonian

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST BURP CLOTHS.
customer_reviews.text: I have all kind of burp cloths. Cotton ones, ones with towel material, cute ones with flowers, etc.. these are hands down the best. They actually absorb spit up. Seriously I'm ordering another set for my sister!
customer_reviews.author: Elina mironenko

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: These were my favorite of all the burp cloths we had. A good size, very durable. Will purchase as a gift for others definitely.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Rosner

customer_reviews.title: Item not as pictures
customer_reviews.text: I love these and they are a go to for me and my baby. However, I specifically ordered this for the "peanut" shape but they arrived as the standard "c" shaped variety. Very disappointed - Amazon, how does this happen??
customer_reviews.author: Amanda S Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Great burp cloths, buy more than you think you need!
customer_reviews.text: I love these muslin burp cloths. They are large, soft and absorbent. I have purchase 3 packages as I have them stashed all through my house, car and stroller and I am always washing them in rotation.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Feightner

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am obsessed with these burp clothes. They’re soft, absorbent and fit wonderfully over the shoulder. The curve also means they can double as a bib for infants in a pinch. I ordered two more packs!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Ewing

customer_reviews.title: ... the aden and anais burp cloths but I feel like they just cant hold as much spit up and ...
customer_reviews.text: The material seems ok compared to the aden and anais burp cloths but I feel like they just cant hold as much spit up and they dont stay on your shoulder as well as the aden and anais ones due to the shape.
customer_reviews.author: Shayna Simon

customer_reviews.title: Best Burp Cloths
customer_reviews.text: These are the best burp cloths. I've used other, cheaper ones, and always come back to these. They are heavy duty and very soft for wiping baby's mouth/cheek. The are large and wipe up well. Easy to launder too. Well worth the cost, as they will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Denise H.

customer_reviews.title: My fave burp cloths
customer_reviews.text: These burp clothes are awesome. I have the Aden and Anis ones as well (burpy bib) and I like these better. They don't have the snap buttons to turn into a bib like the A&A ones do, but I like the feel of this material much better. They are lighter in feel, very absorbent, love the vibrant colors, stay on the shoulder better, and a cheaper then A&A. Definitely a good product and purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Rushabh Mehta

customer_reviews.title: practical burp cloth
customer_reviews.text: As burp cloths go these are great. They are not as cute or pretty as some out there but they are big and soft and most importantly they can absorb lots or spit up. I have washed them many times and they come out clean ans continue to be soft. I do recommend buying the colored ones as I do forget sometimes if one is used or not.
customer_reviews.author: Anyon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size & shape for me and baby
customer_reviews.text: They hold well in wash and a nice large size! I may order more! I love the material
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Love These Burp Cloths
customer_reviews.text: Had one set of these and quickly realized you need much more that three with a new born. Amazon Prime’d them and they arrived the next day! Saved this sleep deprived, milk covered Mom.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Spit up soaks right through
customer_reviews.text: These do not absorb much, in my opinion, but I like how big they are!
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Just the right size to drape over your shoulder and super absorbent but hold their shape and less worn looking than regular cloth diapers. Use them as burp cloths and can never have enough!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah F.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality and shape! A must have!
customer_reviews.text: These are our favorite burp cloths!! We especially love the contoured shape - it doesn’t leave us fighting with extra cloth that dangles over the outside of the shoulder unlike other burp cloths we received at our baby shower.
customer_reviews.author: SARA PHILLIPS

customer_reviews.title: Longer than burpy bibs and just as nice
customer_reviews.text: When burp cloths were dictating how frequently I did laundry, it was time to buy more. We loved the aden and anias burpy bibs and these looked to be quite similar. In fact, they are about two inches longer than aden and anias, still as soft and absorbant and a little bit cheaper. They only lack the snap that makes the aden and anias burpy bib work as a bab. As a burp cloth, I highly recommend these. In the picture, both cloths are folded in half and lined up at the fold to show how much longer the green sprouts cloth is.
customer_reviews.author: ALWTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Soft and cute burp cloth set
customer_reviews.text: These are very soft but the hourglass shape is a little small. I think they will work well but may not cover as much of my clothing as I was hoping.
customer_reviews.author: Lfc 19

customer_reviews.title: Love these! My baby spits up A LOT I ...
customer_reviews.text: Love these! My baby spits up A LOT I got two orders of these. They’re curved so they stay on your shoulder better
customer_reviews.author: CJMM

customer_reviews.title: Love these burp cloths! So soft.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these burp cloths. I used them for both of my sons. They are long in length and soft. The colors are great. I wash them and have no issues. So useful.
customer_reviews.author: run99

customer_reviews.title: I was so excited when I got these because they're ...
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited when I got these because they're huge... Once you wash and dry them they shrink to probably 3/4 the size.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Mosher

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly soft
customer_reviews.text: I love these burp cloths. They are incredibly soft, they maintain their shape and size after washing and drying unlike other burp cloths Ive tried. They are not bulky but are very absorbent. Worth every penny! They are a hit as baby shower gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Great for newborns!
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite burp cloths for my newborn. We bought four packs and always have some on hand! Handles spit up and washes!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Absorbency!
customer_reviews.text: Obsessed with these burp cloths. They're absorbent, easy to clean, and hold up amazingly well in the wash. Will be reordering!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Mewherter

customer_reviews.title: Lovely burp cloths!
customer_reviews.text: I love these! They are thick and absorbent and still look nice after many washings!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel W.

customer_reviews.title: Don't have snaps
customer_reviews.text: I thought these would have snaps on them like the aden & anais ones; so they could be used as a bib. My fault for not reading the details.
customer_reviews.author: MinnesotaMiss

customer_reviews.title: Very absorbent, soft and good size.
customer_reviews.text: Baby likes playing with them, too. No complaints. As soft or softer than the Aiden & Anais ones we got but waaaay better value.
customer_reviews.author: EB

customer_reviews.title: they are way bigger than I thought... ...
customer_reviews.text: they are way bigger than I thought... I haven't had the baby yet so we'll see... but my first impression was the size!
customer_reviews.author: Anali

customer_reviews.title: Just as good as another name brand
customer_reviews.text: Just as good as another name brand. AA. I love them and got more for the money with these. I can't tell a difference between the two brands, we have both.
customer_reviews.author: graysonsmom

customer_reviews.title: Great curved design for shoulder.
customer_reviews.text: These are a splurge and I loved the curved design to go around my shoulder. They are easy to clean and very absorbent.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: These are my favorite burp cloths
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite burp cloths, and, everyone who sees them asks about where they can get them because they are so great.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 2

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite burp clothes! I always reach for these considering they're bigger, softer, and more observant then my plain ol prefolds
customer_reviews.author: Alex Bogherie

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: These burp cloths are great! They are absorbent, soft, perfect thickness and size, and brightly colored. Muslin is the way to go! These are so much better than most of the burp cloths you get from a store. I won't use anything else from this point forward. This brand is also reasonably priced compared to other similar muslin burp cloths, but they are a high quality item.
customer_reviews.author: Brie

customer_reviews.title: the best
customer_reviews.text: These are great!! soft and absorbent. My favorite burp cloth of all the brands we bought (and received as gifts). Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: lvjn23

customer_reviews.title: Soft For Baby
customer_reviews.text: This is by far one of the best items we registered for. The soft nature of the fabric is easy on baby's skin. It's also pretty absorbent which helps when baby spits up. This burp pad is not only comfy, but thick and organic. We LOVE this product and so does our son.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: These are a very nice material, but I thought they had snaps like ...
customer_reviews.text: These are a very nice material, but I thought they had snaps like the Aden & Anais burp cloths so they could be worn as a bib. They don't, but like I said, are great quality and good for newborns.
customer_reviews.author: Britany G Dilley

customer_reviews.title: Quality!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality!!! I love them and they don’t bleed when you wash them.
customer_reviews.author: Luisa S.

customer_reviews.title: The best burp cloths we own
customer_reviews.text: The best burp cloths we own! I was given some and bought more because we seem to never have enough clean.
customer_reviews.author: A. Dominick

customer_reviews.title: we mark these as a great buy - highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: These are so amazingly thick compared to most other burp clothes. I wouldn't rank them quite as high as the Aden + Anais cloths, but they certainly come a close second. And at a lesser price, we mark these as a great buy - highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: M Hirst

customer_reviews.title: No snaps like the Aiden Anaid brand has which are priceless when ...
customer_reviews.text: No snaps like the Aiden Anaid brand has which are priceless when baby gets a but bigger and allows you to use these as bibs. Spend a couple extra bucks for the Aiden & Anais. Otherwise, these are great quality.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: Received these today and couldn't be more happy with the quality! I will note that they are a tad bit thinner than the Aiden + Annias ones but are way softer and a fraction of the cost! Baby due to arrive in October so I will update as soon as I am able to use the burp cloths.
customer_reviews.author: ReneeV

customer_reviews.title: Functional, soft, & good looking!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love these burp cloths! They are a good thickness to make them functional but still very soft for baby. My baby likes to snuggle them! lol
customer_reviews.author: Sarah E.

customer_reviews.title: It's good for a new born
customer_reviews.text: It's good for a new born. Since it's only covers a 7 " line on your shoulder, and sits about 11" on front and back of your shoulder. After two months, it's just there to get soiled with your shirt and babies clothes! To be fair it's very absorbent.
customer_reviews.author: G.A.k

customer_reviews.title: Perfect burp cloth
customer_reviews.text: Love the colors, how soft they are and the size!
customer_reviews.author: reader

customer_reviews.title: Not my favorite burp cloths
customer_reviews.text: I would not recommend this product. My daughter is barely 2 months old and there is already a hole in one of them! Also, I don’t find them very absorbent
customer_reviews.author: HJM

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: HANDS DOWN MY FAVORITE BURP CLOTHS. Buy three times more than you were planning on. ;)
customer_reviews.author: Bradshaw&Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Nice burp cloths
customer_reviews.text: I have bought several of these in the past. They are thick with several layers of muslin bound together. I crochet pretty borders around them and give as baby gifts!
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Great Burp Cloth
customer_reviews.text: These are a must have for a newborn. These are the perfect burp clothes. We bought a ton of them and use them everyday for our newborn. There are very absorbent and easy to wash.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Quality & Size
customer_reviews.text: These were a baby shower gift and I was so pleased with the softness of the material and the generous size of the cloths. The colors were true to how they were advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa D.

customer_reviews.title: These are absolutely amazing. Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: These are absolutely amazing. Worth every penny. When my little one spits up, I feel like these can hold a gallon of milk they are so absorbent! Super soft and nice and long! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jori R.

customer_reviews.title: My favorite!!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite burp clothes. I love the size, durability, and absorbency. I just wish they weren’t so pricey.
customer_reviews.author: TTM

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love these. They are the perfect size and shape ...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these. They are the perfect size and shape and hold up great in the wash! Soft and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Picou

customer_reviews.title: I thought I'd love these as much as A+A but they felt really ...
customer_reviews.text: I thought I'd love these as much as A+A but they felt really skinny and dinky in comparison. The quality is great and they are absorbent and wash up great. However, the actual shape wasn't what I hoped for.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

product_meta.title: green sprouts Muslin Burp Cloths made from Organic Cotton | 4 absorbent layers protect from sniffles, drips & drools | 100% organic cotton muslin, Super soft & softer with every wash, Machine washable
product_meta.description: Color:WhiteBaby’s skin will feel soft and smooth next to organically grown cotton Muslin Burp Cloths. Four absorbent, thick and thirsty layers are generously sized to absorb dribbles, and yet breathable to keep baby cozy, dry, and comfy. Choose between simple white or bright, fun colors.
feature_bullets: 4 absorbent layers protect from sniffles, drips & drools
super soft & softer with every wash
